name: Derpy the Unicorn
description:
Description

That malicious pegasi have not invited Derpy to their party! Help him to build stairs to the heaven, but watch out - they might be pretty unstable!

Controls

Tools Used

Unity

Audacity

Blender

Musescore

Photoshop

Known issues

-It’s possible to jump on some of levitated objects, ans fly to clouds.
